      • withPrecisionValues

        public ParquetWriterOptions.Builder withPrecisionValues(int... precisionValues)
        Overwrite flattened precision values for all decimal columns that are expected to be in this Table. The list of precisions should be an in-order traversal of all Decimal columns, including nested columns. Please look at the example below. NOTE: The number of `precisionValues` should be equal to the numbers of Decimal columns otherwise a CudfException will be thrown. Also note that the values will be overwritten every time this method is called Example: Table0 : c0[type: INT32] c1[type: Decimal32(3, 1)] c2[type: Struct[col0[type: Decimal(2, 1)], col1[type: INT64], col2[type: Decimal(8, 6)]] c3[type: Decimal64(12, 5)] Flattened list of precision from the above example will be {3, 2, 8, 12}

      • build

        public ParquetWriterOptions build()
